eas_text: A civil authority has issued AN ADMINISTRATIVE MESSAGE for the following counties or areas: Maricopa, AZ; at 02:25 AM ON DEC 31, 2025 Effective until 10:25 AM. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text:
A SAFE Alert has been issued for Gilbert Police Department. This is the Arizona Department of Public Safety. Gilbert PD is looking for 15-year-old, white male Luke Hoskins, last seen on foot wearing a black hat, glasses, necklace, white shirt with black jacket, jeans and black shoes. He is 5'7", 159 pounds with brown hair and brown eyes. Luke suffers from a medical condition(s) and may become disoriented or easily confused. If located, please contact the Gilbert Police Department at 480-503-6500 or call 911.

If you have contact with this SAFE Alert, please call 911. Monitor TV and Radio for updates.
